Text:
IT's in Fucking Russian! I mean, other audio, don't know french or spanish is heard on the background, but a fucking russian translator is always telling you the movie in RUSSIAN on the foreground, rendering the movie unaudible, and there's only one audio channel.

FUCK YOU MORON! IT'S JUST SO STUPID, I'M GONNA WATCH THIS FILM AND TOAST TO YOUR MOTHER'S DIRTY PUSSY WHILE I ENJOY IT.
